definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The doctor diagnosed my illness as neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 医生诊断我的病是神经痛。

sentences.english: Some studies have found that acupuncture effectively relieves menstrual cramps.
sentences.chinese: 有研究表明针灸可以有效的缓解经痛。

sentences.english: Antidepressants and anticonvulsants are the two pharmacological classes which represent first-line agents in the management of neuropathic pain.
sentences.chinese: 抗抑郁和抗惊厥药物是治疗神经痛的一线药物。

sentences.english: The rules of point selection of trigeminal neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 三叉神经痛的取穴原则。

sentences.english: Good for temporal migraine and nose congestion and menstrual cramp.
sentences.chinese: 太阳穴偏头痛及鼻塞，经痛均有效。

sentences.english: Is memory neuralgic how should treat?
sentences.chinese: 内存神经痛该怎么治疗？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical features and characteristic of auxiliary examination of neuralgic amyotrophy(NA).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经痛性肌萎缩的临床及辅助检查特点。

sentences.english: Why does tense meeting cause costal region neuralgic ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么紧张会引起肋间神经痛？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate an effective method of treating primary trigeminal neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性三叉神经痛的有效治法。

sentences.english: The results showed that the analgesic effect of PC-2 was statistically significant.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明氨酚待因2号片对神经痛的镇痛效果明显。

sentences.english: This is a relatively new drug for neuropathic and post-herpetic pain.
sentences.chinese: 这是一类与神经痛和后发性疱疹性疼痛。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data of 26 cases with trigeminal neuralgia were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法对26例三叉神经痛的病例资料进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the clinical features and nursing care of neuralgic amyotrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经痛性肌萎缩的临床及护理特点。

sentences.english: He said he often became angry and suffered from psychosomatic pain.
sentences.chinese: 他说他经常发脾气，并且遭受神经痛。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of intradermic injection on the postherpetic neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨皮内注射治疗带状疱疹后神经痛的效果。

sentences.english: Intercostal neuralgia causes paroxysmal burning pain or pricking pain.
sentences.chinese: 肋间神经痛呈阵发性的灼痛或刺痛。
